com.structed.dal
Class StandardReader

java.lang.Object
  com.structed.dal.StandardReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Reader
Direct Known Subclasses:
LazyReader
public class StandardReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements Reader

A standard reader It reads the data in the following format: label index_of_feature_i:value_of_feature_i (this holds also for sparse data, when many values are zeros, see mnist data for example)
